description: Looking for some tougher gear huh?
First thing you'll notice when using an Enchanting Table, is that it has been completely overhauled.

/b/Matrix Enchanting/b/ is a new enchanting system with more depth than vanilla. Use /b/Lapis/b/ and /b/Experinece Levels/b/ to generate /b/Enchantment Pieces/b/. What pieces you fit onto the grid make it on the final enchanted item. Pieces always /6/generate at level 1/6/, but duplicates can be /6/placed ontop of each other/6/ to /b/upgrade/b/ the enchantment.

/6/Incompatible peices will never generate/6/. If you get a /b/Silk Touch/b/ piece, you'll never find a /b/Fortune/b/ piece in that session. /6/Enchant then disenchant to clear/6/ the pending enchantments, or grab a diffrent item.
Some /c/vanilla enchantments have been disabled/c/ in this modpack. Don't bother looking for /c/Protection/c/ and /c/Mending/c/. Instead use specific damage type protections or /b/Mana Repair/b/.
/b/Candles/b/ /6/influence which enchantments/6/ may appear. Up to a /6/maximum of four/6/ candles can influence, and they /6/must be lit/6/.
/d/E/d//a/M/a//b/I/b/ shows the effects of the difrent colored candles. Check uses for the candles, or recipes for enchantments.
Placing /b/Soul Sand/b/ below the candles /6/dampens the enchantment/6/ instead.
The best way to further increase enchantments after this is to enchant /b/Books/b/, or use /b/Ancient Tomes/b/.
